src_original: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni
tgt_original: 常樂乞食，往返不近、不遠，近清淨水，不污、不濁；

src_original: ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
tgt_original: 多諸林樹，無恐怖處，花果具足；

src_original: apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny  advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet /
tgt_original: 遠離惡獸，多諸龕窟，往返不難，寂靜第一。

src_original: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya  svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena  prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
tgt_original: 「菩薩如此處，晝誦三遍、夜亦三遍，聲不高下，善守諸根，心不散亂，深信歡喜，能憶偈句，善取因相，除去睡眠。

src_original: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /  tena teṣām ādareṇa svāgatakriyā kartavyā /  evaṃ cānena vaktavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「王、若王等、若諸王子、婆羅門、剎利及餘人民往至菩薩阿練若處，比丘唱言：

src_original: saced upaviśati dvābhyām apy upaveṣṭavyaṃ /  sacen nopaviśati ubhābhyām api nopaveṣṭavyaṃ /

sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /  sa sanmārjanopalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikeryāpathavigamāya /  prāsādikeryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /  sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 香華供養諸佛形像、塔廟，以是善根願令一切眾生悉除破戒、非法臭穢，當使一切眾生皆得諸佛戒香之身。 若有掃塔塗地，願使一切眾生悉得端正莊嚴之具； 若以華蓋供養佛塔，願一切眾生除煩惱熱；

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 若入僧坊、塔寺，願一切眾生入涅槃城；
若出塔寺，願一切眾生永離生死；

src_original: sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvāpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /
tgt_original: 若開門時，願一切眾生開善趣門； 若閉門時，願一切眾生閉惡趣門；

src_original: sa niṣīdann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若欲坐時，願一切眾生當坐道場；

src_original: sarvasatvān eva parinirvāpayeyaṃ /  sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān vyutthāpayeyaṃ sarvakleśaparyutthānebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若欲起時，願一切眾生於煩惱淤埿悉令超出；
